abstractText: Age data is needed to calculate proportion at age. See methods on data collection for scale age analysis and otolith analysis (Method IDs: 1366 or 1462). The proportion at age is used in calculating Recruits per Spawner (method ID: 5411), which is a Viable Salmonid Population (VSP) indicator.The Interior Columbia Technical Review Team (ICTRT) uses the VSP indicators to assess the current status of the populations in terms of extinction risk (ICTRT 2010).
title: Proportion at Age Calculation v1.0
